name: lychee
tagline: A self-hosted photo management platform with album sharing
description: Lychee is a self-hosted photo-management platform. It allows users to manage albums, upload photos, edit metadata, and share galleries with a clean, mobile-friendly interface ideal for personal or small teams.

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload photos, Organize albums, Batch operations. Manage your photo collection efficiently

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: EXIF data, Tags and descriptions, Location info. Edit photo information easily

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Responsive design, Touch gestures, Mobile upload. Access photos from any device

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find photos, Filter by date, Tag search. Locate photos quickly

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted, Access permissions, Private albums. Keep your photos private

features.title: Image Processing
features.description: Automatic thumbnails, Image optimization, Format conversion. Efficient photo storage
